transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as integer,
		PhoneNumber as long,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	dateFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd']) ~> varncustomer
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> fourthcoffedd
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> southridegecloud
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> southridgestreaming
varncustomer derive(SourceSystemId = 3,
		GlobalCustomerID = concat('3',CustomerID)) ~> SourceSystemId
SourceSystemId select(mapColumn(
		SourceSystemCustomerID = CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		SourceSystemId,
		GlobalCustomerID
	)) ~> vanfinalcustomer
fourthcoffedd derive(SourceSystemId = 2,
		GlobalCustomerID = concat('2', CustomerID)) ~> fourthcoffeedervied
fourthcoffeedervied select(mapColumn(
		SourceSystemCustomerID = CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		SourceSystemId,
		GlobalCustomerID
	)) ~> fourthcoffeeselect
southridegecloud derive(CustomerID = toString(byName('CustomerID')),
		LastName = toString(byName('LastName')),
		FirstName = toString(byName('FirstName')),
		PhoneNumber = toString(byName('PhoneNumber')),
		AddressLine1 = toString(byName('AddressLine1')),
		AddressLine2 = toString(byName('AddressLine2')),
		City = toString(byName('City')),
		State = toString(byName('State')),
		ZipCode = toString(byName('ZipCode')),
		CreatedDate = toDate(byName('CreatedDate')),
		UpdatedDate = toDate(byName('UpdatedDate'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 derive(SourceSystemId = 1,
		GlobalCustomerID = concat('1',CustomerID)) ~> addedcolumn
addedcolumn select(mapColumn(
		SourceSystemCustomerID = CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		SourceSystemId,
		GlobalCustomerID
	)) ~> sourthridgefinalselection
